Body:
"""Get unitful position of controller."""
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.APTMotorController, [init_kdc101[0],
    ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.MOT_REQ_POSCOUNTER, param1=1,
    param2=0, dest=80, source=1, data=None).pack()], [init_kdc101[1],
    ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.MOT_GET_POSCOUNTER, param1=
    None, param2=None, dest=80, source=1, data=struct.pack('<Hl', 1, -20000
    )).pack()], sep='') as apt:
    assert apt.channel[0].position == u.Quantity(-20000, 'counts'
        ) / apt.channel[0].scale_factors[0]
